Today, Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin announced that the IRS will move the tax filing deadline to July 15th this year, providing important relief to taxpayers. Congress is also continuing to work on a bill to further assist taxpayers and the economy.

I appreciate the President acting quickly to sign this bill into law. It will help workers and businesses, as well as remove financial obstacles to testing. It is also important to see that children and other vulnerable populations are able to get meals.
